Name: ４人打ちアクション麻雀 / ACTION MAHJONG
About the game: Add action game and mahjong game, then do not divide by 2! A game that forcibly merged action game and mahjong appeared! Of course, since it is Mahjong, up to 4 players are allowed. Hands that cannot be made normally can dramatically be made, every player can become a winner, and gameplay is excellent too! A lot of new strategies that were not in Mahjong are included, so a new page...even a new chapter is added to the history of Mahjong!
